summary: This is an internal FBI email chain from June 24, 2020, discussing the basis for a perjury charge against an unnamed female individual who allegedly lied during a 2016 civil deposition about her involvement with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Sean
persons.context: Addressed in an email from an FBI CID agent asking for clarification on the basis for a perjury charge.

events.title: Civil deposition of unnamed female
events.description: An unnamed female individual gave a deposition in a civil case where she was asked specific questions about her involvement with Jeffrey Epstein and allegedly lied.

events.title: FBI internal discussion on perjury charge
events.description: FBI agents in New York and CID correspond via email to clarify the basis for a perjury charge related to the 2016 deposition.

keyFacts: An unnamed female individual is alleged to have committed perjury during a 2016 civil deposition regarding her involvement with Jeffrey Epstein.
The FBI was actively discussing the basis for a perjury charge against this individual in June 2020.
The document indicates ongoing investigative activity by the FBI into matters related to Epstein even after his death in 2019.
